data.text:
@KamalKheraLib High Inflation 
Huge rise in Crime
Record break Car thefts
Highest poverty rate
Record breaking taxes (carbon tax)
Poor infrastructure 
No new medical or tech colleges 
No fiscal policies for long term 
No control over black money
Highest level of Corruption 

Thank you🙏 🙂🙃

@KamalKheraLib Madam, Plz protect us from a more deadly virus than coronavirus which is @JustinTrudeau his mental state will blow out the middle class in Canada. He will destroy us with high inflation, poor standard of living, unaffordable housing, rise in crime. He is protected but we r not😔

I was able to hear directly from the staff at @ServiceCanada_E and thank them for all their hard work for the New Horizons for Seniors Program, and for supporting seniors throughout the pandemic and beyond! 3/3

✅ Pandemic benefits
✅ An additional 5,000 NHSP projects to help reduce seniors’ social isolation
✅ GST Credit top-up
✅ One-time tax-free payment of $300 for seniors eligible for OAS and a further $200 for seniors eligible for GIS
✅ One-time payment of $500 for seniors 75+
